title: R Support in Azure Machine Learning
description:
In this episode we will discuss the new R capabilities coming to public preview in Azure Machine Learning, including the new Azure ML R SDK.

Learn More: 
Azure ML SDK for R: https://aka.ms/AzuremlsdkGitHub 
Interface to the Azure ML SDK for R: https://aka.ms/InterfaceAzuremlSdk
